title: Request for Extended Library Hours
description: Request to extend library operating hours until midnight during exam periods to accommodate students' study schedules.

title: WiFi Issues in Engineering Building
description: Frequent disconnections and slow internet speed in Engineering Building, affecting online classes and research work.

title: Additional Study Rooms Request
description: Request for more group study rooms in the library due to high demand during exam periods.
resolution: Two additional study rooms have been allocated and will be available starting next week.

title: Grade Appeal for CS 301
description: Formal appeal regarding midterm exam grading in CS 301. Requesting review of partial credit allocation.
